application.doc: Retrieve the trace components and settings of an existing instance

param.name: id
param.doc: Name of the instance to act on, which is a unique name that identifies the instance

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieve Trace Components and Settings - Authorization Server
method.doc: This web service will retrieve the list of all trace components and their current settings for a specified authorization server instance.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: id
param.doc: The name of the trace component

param.name: level
param.doc: The current tracing level for this component. Valid values are integers 0 - 9 where 0 indicates that tracing is not enabled for the component.

param.name: file_size
param.doc: The current accumulated size of the trace file and all rollover files for this components.

param.name: flush_interval
param.doc: The number of seconds between the flushing of cached records to the log file.

param.name: rollover_size
param.doc: The maximum file size (in bytes) before this file is rolled-over.

param.name: max_rollover_files
param.doc: The maximum number of rolled-over files to keep. If not specified, all rollover files are be kept.

param.name: compress
param.doc: Whether the rollover files should be compressed. This parameter is optional. If not specified the rollover files will not be compressed.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
